🚀 **Agentic AI is 2025’s game-changer!** Beyond static chatbots, it evolves into dynamic agents that auto-adjust marketing strategies & customer interactions. Gartner’s #1 trend & McKinsey’s next frontier—autonomous AI that learns & adapts in real-time. VC is pouring into startups making this a reality. Where are YOU integrating AI agents? #AgenticAI #AIInMarketing
